alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 1:51PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area especially below canyons along the eastern foothills to the Interstate 25 corridor. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. Blowing dust may reduce visibilities at times.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
